string.value: You've successfully completed the Socks. Mrs. Claus thinks that Santa Claus will be satisfied with them. Now, you must hang the socks in a good location so that it will be seen easily by Santa Claus.

You've found a Christmas tree where you can hang the socks. This tree must be the one that Santa Claus used to visit whenever he was worried. Obviously, this is not a normal tree since it can talk! The tree tells you that doing good deeds will allow you to receive better gifts from Santa. You should go around town to see if there is anything you can do to help.\n\n#t4031885# #b#c4031885##k/4
You've helped the people in Happyville and also received a present from Santa Claus. Here's hoping that everyone will have a Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas~~~!! Would you like to hang your Christmas Socks on the tree for Chirstmas present?

You have successfully hung the Christmas socks on the tree.\nNow what you need is #bMapler Recommendations#k. Please be kind and do the good things to others before Santa Claus puts gift into your Socks. Your good conduct will be very effective for what kind of present you will be getting from Santa Claus.
Please talk to me again when you change your mind. Don't forget, you must come back before this event is over!
There are people in some places who still needs your help. Just like you have done so far, please look around this town and give good deed to the others. You will be full of happiness.
